item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Eric (Aka nAPTaX), i’m a 48 years old üõπ SKATER, father of 4 and üßë‚Äçüåæ ETHICAL HACKER with a love for low level ‚ù§Ô∏è Reverse Engineering ‚ù§Ô∏è. I co-founded several IT & Cloud companies for 20 years. Security Domains Reverse Engineering Intel/ARM Malware Analysis Ethical Hacker Security Researcher Fuzzing Skills Disassemblers Ghidra IDA … of course ;-) IDA Python scripts for automation RIZIN CUTTER HOPPER Dev RIZIN Scripts Debuger and Dynamic instrumentation XDbg64 Dynamic instrumentation avec FRIDA Langages C/C++ Deep Internal Windows Programming Python RUST And sometime NIM to dance behind EDR ;-) Frameworks i like pwntools Google oss-fuzz Threat management CVE Evaluation Framework MITRE ATT&CK YARA Rules SIEM searches with SIGMA Sandbox ANY.
